title: Update Quarkus release planning page

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

As a Quarkus user I found the Quarkus release planning page - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/wiki/Release-Planning - quite useful to know roughly when to expect updates.
It seems this has not been updated since 2.7.

Could it be updated? Or if the plan is to communicate releases in some other way (e.g. issue milestones) then perhaps the link in the README could be replaced with a link to that.

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
